AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.84 illegal aliens: Group of smuggled persons found in a flatbed trailer near Laredo, Texas, headed to Dallas
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.the load: Refers to the 84 illegal aliens being hauled
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.You Brokerage: company under investigation with no record of existence and non-functional phone number, paid Abdullah Yusuf $2,700 to haul the load
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Steel on Steel Transportation: Abdullah Yusuf's company, not listed as the carrier on the BOL
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States Trucking: carrier listed on the BOL for the load in question
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.BOL: document related to the smuggling operation, appeared to be forged by doctoring an older one, received by Abdullah Yusuf before heading to Dallas
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.flatbed trailer used for smuggling 84 il: Trailer used by Abdullah Yusuf to transport 84 illegal aliens near Laredo, Texas
